communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All documents and emails that reference investigations by US Department of Education on antisemitism and Islamophobia at public colleges across the nation from March 2024 - October 2024 
- All emails and other correspondance between advocacy groups representing students to US Department of Education, or vice versa, referencing pro-Palestine encampment protests in higher education from March 2024-October 2024 
- All emails and other correspondance from corporate representatives to US Department of Education, and/or vice versa, referencing pro-Palestine encampment protests in public higher education from March 2024-October 2024 
- All emails from US Department of Education referencing pro-Palestine encampment protests in colleges from April 2024-July 2024 
- All emails from US Department of Education referencing protest management in higher education from May 2024-October 2024

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Atmika Iyer

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- Emails from UC President Michael Drake, UC Regents and UC chancellors referencing policing of pro-Palestine encampment protests from March 2024-October 2024. 
- Emails from UC President Michael Drake and UC Regents referencing his departure from the UC System from May 2024-August 2024
- Emails from UC Police Chiefs and Michael Drake referencing the 2021 Campus Policing Plan from March 2024-October 2024
- Emails from UC President Michael Drake and UC Regents referencing students arrested in pro-Palestine protests from April 2024-June 2024
- Emails from representatives of UC’s investors or representatives of any corporation to UC Regents or President Michael Drake referencing pro-Palestine protest encampments from April 2024-October 2024
- Emails between state officials and UC Regents and/or UC President Michael Drake that reference pro-Palestine encampment protests from April 2024-October 2024

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Atmika Iyer
